query.statement: SELECT B.CENTER_CODE, B.CUSTCD, C.CUSTNM, B.ITEM_CODE, D.ITEM_NAME, D.ITEM_SIZE, D.PO_UOM , DECODE(D.TAX_CODE,'100','과세','210','면세') TAX_NAME , D.KEEPING_TYPE, D.ORIGIN_TYPE , NVL(A.APPLY_DATE,#p_APPLY_DATE#) AS APPLY_DATE , A.ITEM_FEATURE ,(SELECT CODE_NAME FROM SCC_COMMON_CODE WHERE GROUP_CODE = 'FS0033' AND CODE = A.ITEM_FEATURE) AS FEATURE_NAME , A.WORK_TYPE , '' AS FLAG , TO_CHAR(A.CDATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') CDATE FROM HLDC_ST_CUST C, HLDC_PO_ITEM_MST D ,(SELECT CENTER_CODE, CUSTCD, ITEM_CODE, APPLY_DATE, ITEM_FEATURE, WORK_TYPE,CDATE FROM FSI_ITEM_FEATURE WHERE WORK_TYPE = 'M' AND CENTER_CODE = #p_CENTER_CODE# AND CUSTCD = #p_CUSTCD# AND APPLY_DATE = #p_APPLY_DATE#) A ,(SELECT DISTINCT CENTER_CODE, CUSTCD, ITEM_CODE FROM (SELECT A.CENTER_CODE, A.CUSTCD, A.ITEM_CODE FROM FSI_ITEM_FEATURE A WHERE A.WORK_TYPE = 'M' AND A.APPLY_DATE = #p_APPLY_DATE# AND A.CENTER_CODE = #p_CENTER_CODE# AND A.CUSTCD = #p_CUSTCD# UNION ALL SELECT A.CENTER_UPJANG AS CENTER_CODE, A.CUSTCD, C.ITEM_CODE FROM HLDC_PO_CENTER_CUSTOM A , HLDC_PO_CUSTOM_ITEM C WHERE A.CENTER_UPJANG = C.CENTER_UPJANG AND A.CUSTCD = C.CUSTCD AND A.USE_TYPE = '01' AND C.USE_TYPE = '01' AND A.CENTER_UPJANG = #p_CENTER_CODE# AND A.CUSTCD = #p_CUSTCD#)) B WHERE B.CENTER_CODE = A.CENTER_CODE(+) AND B.CUSTCD = A.CUSTCD(+) AND B.ITEM_CODE = A.ITEM_CODE(+) AND B.CUSTCD = C.CUSTCD AND B.ITEM_CODE = D.ITEM_CODE AND (B.CENTER_CODE, B.CUSTCD, B.ITEM_CODE) NOT IN (SELECT CENTER_CODE, CUSTCD, ITEM_CODE FROM FSI_ITEM_FEATURE WHERE WORK_TYPE <> 'M' AND APPLY_DATE = #p_APPLY_DATE# AND CENTER_CODE = #p_CENTER_CODE#) ORDER BY C.CUSTNM, B.ITEM_CODE
